### File structure generated by qwen

```
rag-app/
│
├── .env # Environment variables (API keys, paths)
├── .gitignore
├── requirements.txt # Python dependencies
├── README.md
│
├── data/ # Your personal/private documents
│ ├── pdfs/
│ ├── txts/
│ └── notes.txt
│
├── vectorstore/ # (Optional) Persisted vector DB (e.g., Chroma)
│ └── chroma_db/ # Saved embeddings
│
├── src/
│ ├── **init**.py
│ │
│ ├── ingestion/ # Document loading & chunking
│ │ ├── **init**.py
│ │ ├── loader.py # Load files (PDF, TXT, etc.)
│ │ └── splitter.py # Text splitting logic
│ │
│ ├── retrieval/ # Embedding + vector store
│ │ ├── **init**.py
│ │ ├── embedder.py # Embedding model setup
│ │ └── vectorstore.py # Create/retrieve vector DB
│ │
│ ├── generation/ # LLM + prompt logic
│ │ ├── **init**.py
│ │ ├── llm.py # LLM client (OpenAI, Groq, Ollama, etc.)
│ │ └── prompt.py # System prompts, templates
│ │
│ ├── agent/ # LangGraph agent logic
│ │ ├── **init**.py
│ │ ├── state.py # AgentState (TypedDict)
│ │ ├── nodes.py # call_agent, tool_node, etc.
│ │ └── graph.py # Workflow definition & compile()
│ │
│ └── tools/ # Custom tools (web search, calculator, etc.)
│ ├── **init**.py
│ └── web_search.py # DuckDuckGo, SerpAPI, etc.
│
├── app.py # Main entry point (CLI or FastAPI)
├── ui/ # (Optional) Streamlit/Gradio/FastAPI frontend
│ └── streamlit_app.py
│
└── tests/ # Unit/integration tests
└── test_retrieval.py
```
